message.say: Of course Jordan! Today we practised evaluating persuasive texts! In order to evaluate persuasive texts we must identify the topic, the main argument, and then any supporting information.

message.say: Supporting information is the information a writer includes in their main argument to back up their argument.

message.say: Yes! Jordan you are right! Also in this type of writing many people try to use emotional appeals, which means that a writer is using their emotions to get their point across. Emotional appeals are only good in this type of writing only if a writer supports it by facts and not emotion. Emotional appeals that are not backed up by facts but emotions are better for advertisements.
